step_data.thought: I've clicked on 'Change status' in the Actions dropdown, and now I should see a submenu with options to either 'Enable' or 'Disable' the product. Looking at the page state, I can see this submenu is indeed visible as list items [1398] and [1400], with 'Enable' and 'Disable' options respectively. Since my goal is to change the status of the Sports Watch to disabled, I need to click on the 'Disable' option at position [1400].
